activities.loc: Grant County Courthouse - Br. II - 2nd Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin Ray Ringleman

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Justin Ray Ringleman in court.  Attorney Anthony Pozorski, Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ian Mickelson in court for Justin Ray Ringleman. Defendant completed and presented a waiver of PH Form to court. The Court reviewed the waiver and find the defendant knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily waives his rights and binds the matter over. An Information has been filed. Defendant waives further reading and pleads Not Guilty. Court accepts plea. Status: 10/6/22 at 1:00 pm. JT weeks 10/25/22 & 11/1/22.
Status conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 6, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Justin Ray Ringleman appeared by video, in custody from Grant County Jail.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Court explains charges, penalties, and right to counsel. Defendant referred to SPD. Defendant is currently employed. State requests a signature bond. Court heard and orders $1000 signature bond. Status date set.
Status conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
